title: Median Gray
description: SFPD Sgt. Adam Plantinga, author of 400 Things Cops Know and Police Craft. At a time when New Yorkâ€™s mean streets were their meanest, one NYPD detective at the end of his career takes one last chance to correct a 20-year-old injustice, and another cop at the beginning of his career tries to stop him before a police department already scarred by corruption investigations takes another hit.
author: Bill Mesce Jr.
